description: Just one copy of the 1 of 1 Ring card, part of a Lord of the Rings expansion set, will be printed, and collectors really want it.

title: Hell yeah, Hammerwatch 2 is basically going to be Diablo Lite without the live service cruft
description: This hidden gem of an indie action-RPG is getting a surprisingly big sequel.

title: EU commissioner calls for AI regulations: 'I don't see any right of machines to freedom of expression'
description: Specifically, she's seeking new rules designed to prevent AI from being used to generate false information.

description: The Battletech community on Reddit was in an uproar over the weekend after moderators were found deleting posts related to Pride.
